hooks.command: bash -c 'echo "=== AxCouncil Session Started ==="; echo "Date: $(date)"; echo "CSS Budget: 1300KB source, 700KB built"; if [ -f todo/EXIT-READINESS-25M.md ]; then echo "Exit readiness doc found"; fi'

bash -c 'FILE="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$FILE" == *.css ]]; then LINES=$(wc -l < "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || echo 0); if [ "$LINES" -gt 300 ]; then echo "WARNING: CSS file exceeds 300 lines ($LINES lines). Consider splitting." >&2; fi; fi'
bash -c 'CMD="$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT"; if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE "git push.*--force|git reset --hard|rm -rf /|rm -rf ~"; then echo "BLOCKED: Dangerous command detected: $CMD" >&2; exit 2; fi'
